ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Rogues and bards (was Why didn't I log out sooner?)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Heh.  I ve made the mistake of telling people when they refuse to use a looting order that I m going to pick the pockets of every Xth mob (in a party of X
ygData.messageBody:
> From: Randy Keith [mailto:Kalekona@...]
> Unfortunatly, most newbies are scared that the rogue's are
> stealing all thier copper that they cannot see
> them for the tanks/damage dealers they are. The Pickpocket
> skill is so misunderstood it is not even funny.

Heh. I've made the mistake of telling people when they refuse to use a
looting order that I'm going to pick the pockets of every Xth mob (in a
party of X players) and that I'll leave the rest for them to loot. Amazing
how quickly these groups disband. It took me a while to figure out I was
better off saying nothing. ;^)

> From: Perhaps a Princess... [mailto:sarah@...]
> (stealing all their copper that, in not very many levels, they'll be
> tossing in piles on the ground anyway??? And that if they are
> true newbies worrying about that!)

By "true newbie" I assume you mean non-twinks, since a non-twinked secondary
character will need to count their coppers as much as a primary character at
the lower levels.

Twinks, as a general rule, only group with other twinks. I've gotten a few
gifts (guard bracer, bracer of Erollisi, Dragoon Dirk, two earings of
desease reflection & a carnelian wedding band to be exact), but still don't
quite live up to the standards of twink groups.

Peace
Mead, loot-stealer of 12 convictions
Evulia, bard of 11 missed notes
